treatment.reference: Complete Genome Sequence of the Thermoacidophilic Crenarchaeon Thermoproteus uzoniensis 768-20 J Bact 193:3256-3257
treatment.description: Thermophilic anaerobic crenarchaeon isolated from a solfataric field in Moutnovsky volcano, Kamchatka, Russia. Obligate anaerobic acidophile growing optimally at pH 5.5 and 85ËšC on proteinaceous substrates and some sugars, reducing elemental sulfur to H2S.
